thread.title: NASCAR Brawl After Driver Sucker-Punches Rival...
thread.title_full: NASCAR Brawl After Driver Sucker-Punches Rival...

title: NASCAR Brawl After Driver Sucker-Punches Rival...
text:
Kyle Busch sucker-punched Joey Logano in a furious post-race brawl Kyle Busch sucker-punched Joey Logano in a furious post-race brawl By Andrew Joseph March 12, 2017 7:35 pm Follow @andyj0seph 771 shares Follow @andyj0seph 
Kyle Busch was furious at Joey Logano after Busch’s No. 18 spun out on the final lap of Sunday’s NASCAR Monster Energy Cup Kobalt 400 in Las Vegas. There was some contact with Logano’s car that caused the wreck, and after the race, Busch went straight for Logano. 
A closer look of the incident showed the Busch landed a punch on Logano before the crew members wrestled Busch to the ground. 
NASCAR officials eventually carried Busch away from the fight, and Busch emerged with a cut on his forehead. "That's how Joey races. He's gonna get it."- @KyleBusch after the altercation in Vegas with the No. 22 crew. #NASCAR https://t.co/GEOtnXrQZf 
— FOX Sports (@FOXSports) March 12, 2017 
After the fight, Busch answered questions from Fox Sports and was still fuming at Logano who finished fourth.
